simplesect.para: Subversion's modular design (covered in ) and the availability of language bindings (as described in ) make it a likely candidate for use as an extension or backend to other pieces of software. In this appendix, we'll briefly introduce you to some of the many third-party tools that are using Subversion functionality under-the-hood.
For a more recently updated version of this information, check out the Links page on the Subversion website (http://subversion.tigris.org/project_links.html).
